entry.title: Friday: Drizzle or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Drizzle changing to rain or drizzle near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain or drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
